name: Room669
description:
Room669

»What does the imprisonment of a janitor, a majestic wooden horse and a room filled to the top with water have in common? Answer these questions and more by making your way through the chaos-ridden hallways of a not so typical university.«

Room669 is a first person walking simulator, in wich you uncover the circumstances of a huge campus riot. On your way to find out what happend, you will encounter many obstacles to overcome, and in the end uncover the story of the ridiculous situation.

Teammembers:
Anika Handtke, Alisa Feldhofer, Clara Müller, Markus Werner
